info.description:
pyGSM is a Python module which uses pySerial to provide a nifty interface to
send and receive SMS via a GSM Modem. It was ported from RubyGSM, and provides
(almost) all of the same features.
info.name: pygsm
info.summary: Send SMS using devices attached to serial port
info.html_description: pyGSM is a Python module which uses pySerial to provide a nifty interface to send and receive SMS via a GSM Modem. It was ported from RubyGSM, and provides (almost) all of the same features.
